body.p:
Per French Mail
London, 21st Jan. 1869.
SCHEIBLER BROTHERS & Co
19 Old Broad St.
LONDON, E.C.
Messrs. L. Kniffler +Co., Yokohama.
We confirm our respectful letter from 15th of this month and
report from our silk market that
turnover has dropped again;
only cheap prices tempt people into
purchases, so that e.g.
very nice No 2 @ 2½ Sinchew... @ 30/
and good No 2½ @ 3 Maybash.. ＂ 29/
got sold.
From the continent we have had news that
satin and velvets are about to start playing a
significant role; in that case nice, fine Japanese
grèges may experience far stronger
demand; naturally we are doing our
utmost for your wares.
Chinas are still following a downward trend,
especially ordinary qualities.-
Japanese silkworm eggs will give rise to big
disappointments in the current season;
the weak transactions in this produce
revenues that cause the importers
serious losses.-

In Manchester Goods it is quieter, the price
demanded is 16¼ @ 16½ for 28/32 twist
10/6@ 10/9 ＂ ℔[?] 8¼ grey shirtings
Tea is very unsatisfactory.
Bank discount 3% minimum for 1to 3 months’ bills. We deliver to you overleaf the insurance note for Company sign Heynssen Martienssen & Co. On the line sits a ✡ (Star of David) containing the letters H M Co , and below the Star of David and between the lines the word Yokohama 6075/6134=60 bales of
grey shirts, which have been shipped to you
on the Empress by Messrs. Heynssen Martienssen
+Co., Manchester, by order of your Mr. L. Kniffler,
amounting to:
£ 80„5„-Ca 8th Jan. 1869
against you; for this shipment
⟨Mem 86⟩ we accepted the bill of exchange by that house for
£ 1582„9„- per12/15th July 69,
for which we ask you to credit us; furthermore
please oblige us by crediting the Bank-Comm[?]
for this at 1½% ....£23„14„6 per today.
As usual, we are thus holding the lien[?]
for the abovementioned 60 bales + consequently
remittances are to be made to us by you very quickly
with a view to providing cover. Messrs. Bollenhagen +Co.,
Hamburg, are sending you the invoice and bill of
lading; they wrote to us that in the case of the expiry of
intended £ 1582„9„- there will be an extension of a further

6 months. _
Hopefully we will hear from you by the
mail arriving here on the 25th of this month;
in the meantime we send you our most
cordial greetings
Scheibler Brothers +Co.
